trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around October 27th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 11:10 am while making sales calls, I was stopped at the intersection of Gate Parkway and J Turner Butler Blvd facing east. While stopped and looking up at about a 45 degree angle though my windshield I noticed a flashing object at a very high altitude. There were no contrails associated with the flash. The flash was similar to a reflection of light from a mirrored object. It only lasted 4-5 seconds and there was no sign of any other activity as I continued to scan the sky. I am an aircraft enthusiast and quite frequently look to the skies for navy aircraft that train in our area.
Summary: Flash at high altitude with no contrails
